Pistachio Salad

Ingredients

  • 1 large Cool Whip
  • 1 pistachio pudding ?
  • 1 lg can pineapple
  • 2 cup marshmallow cream?
  • 1/2 pecans ???

Instructions

  1. Mix pudding and pineapple
  2. Add marshmallow cream and combine
  3. Add cool whip and combine
  4. Chill in refrigerator
  5. Top with pecans and serve chilled
